info.name: Moment Hub Backend API
info.description:
This is backend api for **MOMENT HUB.**

## Base Url

```
https://be.momentshub.org/api

 ```

## Headers

`Accept: application/json`

`Content-Type: application/json`

For requests containing media files:

`Content-Type: multipart/form-data`

## Authentication

Authentication is provided using Token-Based Authentication. Use the token gotten from the previous request `/register` or `/login` at the Bearer Token for subsequent requests. Each token lasts for 24 hours.

_**Note:**_ _Ensure to redirect your user to the Login url when you receive the_ `_401_` _HTTP status code which shows that the request requires authentication._
